main.name: Khalid Aldawood
main.description: I am a full stack developer and I use the MERN stack to develop websites. I am also interested in data science and machine learning
main.bio: I work at Giza Arabia as a network engineer, with experience in full stack development, data science and machine learning. I live in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia and I am interested in using my skills to help others, create cool useful software and find solutions that makes life simpler.
